==== Ubuntu Women ====
* Launched <nowiki>[[http://wiki.ubuntu-women.org/Events/Competitions/AdaLovelace|Ubuntu Women Month of Making]]</nowiki> in celebration of Ada Lovelace
** <nowiki>[[https://lists.ubuntu.com/archives/ubuntu-women/2011-September/003333.html]]</nowiki>
** <nowiki>[[http://blog.ubuntu-women.org/2011/09/today-starts-the-ubuntu-women-month-of-making/]]</nowiki>
* Team Meeting <nowiki>[[http://wiki.ubuntu-women.org/Meetings/20110908|September 8th]]</nowiki>
* Announced and hosted first <nowiki>[[http://wiki.ubuntu-women.org/CareerDays|Career Days]]</nowiki> session
** <nowiki>[[https://lists.ubuntu.com/archives/ubuntu-women/2011-September/003347.html]]</nowiki>
** <nowiki>[[http://wiki.ubuntu-women.org/CareerDays/LinuxSystemsAdministrator]]</nowiki>
* Of the 686 Ubuntu Members at the end of this month 4.97% are women
